textBox.richText: Cthulhu is the fictional giant creature that embodies all evil and chaos in H. P. Lovecraft's sci-fi novels.  It’s described as a huge squid-like creature that invokes absolute terror. Cthulhu is well known in geek circles - and even plays a main figure in the UserFriendly.org comic strip.  So, when John Kovalic designed this hilariously sick and twisted toy (see right) as a parody to “My Little Pony”, I had to get it.  Plus, its Boxing week, so it was on sale :-) It comes with two terrified victims (shown right) and the warning on the bottom of the box says: WARNING - CHOKING HAZARD Not for children under the age of 14.
